timeline.bodyText: TenantManagementService is using JsonObject instead of Tenant value object
timeline.author: dejanb

timeline.bodyText: Follow the same formatting and put every arg in the separate line.
timeline.author: dejanb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -148,11 +148,10 @@ public void createDevice(final String tenantId, final Optional<String> deviceId,
 
                     // now create the empty credentials set
                     final Promise<OperationResult<Void>> f = Promise.promise();
-                    credentialsService.set(
+                    credentialsService.updateCredentials(
                             tenantId,
                             r.getPayload().getId(),
-                            Optional.empty(),
-                            Collections.emptyList(),
+                            Collections.emptyList(), Optional.empty(),
